queries.text: Who are the subscribers to the memorandum of association? Whatis their respective subscription, i.e. the number/ percentage of sharestaken by or allotted to each subscriber? What is the type of shareallotted to each subscriber, i.e. ordinary share/ preference share/redeemable share/ equity share etc. if provided in the document?Provide the details in a bulleted list in the following format: '1.[Name of Subscriber] - [Subscription Details]; 2. [Name of Subscriber] -[Subscription Details]' and so on.
